techs.name: Patronage
techs.quote: Everything passes-Robust art alone is eternal. The bust survives the city.

techs.name: Acoustics
techs.quote: 'Their rising all at once was as the sound of thunder heard remote' - Milton

techs.name: Publishing
techs.quote: There are three difficulties in authorship: To write anything worth publishing, to find honest men to publish it and to find sensible men to read it- Charles Caleb Colton

techs.name: Calculus
techs.quote: 'In the fall of 1972 President Nixon announced that the rate of increase of inflation was decreasing. This was the first time a sitting president used the third derivative to advance his case for reelection'-Hugo Rossi

techs.name: Rifling
techs.quote: 'It is well that war is so terrible, or we should grow too fond of it.' - Robert E. Lee

techs.name: Scientific Theory
techs.quote: 'Every great advance in science has issued from a new audacity of imagination.' - John Dewey
